Package org.scify.NewSumServer.Server.JSon

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JSonizable
    Interface implemented by *Data.java classes for easy transformation between objects and JSON format
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoriesData
    Class contains categories as strings
    JSon
    Class used as wrapper for Gson with data types that aren't in this package JSonizable interface is implemented for the other classes
    LinkLabelData
    Class contains the link-url and the sourceName which is basically a label for the link-url
    LinksData
    Class contains ArrayList of LinkLabelData.
    SnippetData
    Class contains the basic data needed for the summary.
    SourceData
    Class contains the input source data that was used to get the resulting summary.
    SummaryData
    Class contains data of a summary.
    TopicData
    Class contains the data needed to specify a topic.
    TopicIDsData
    Class contains the topicIDs as strings.
    TopicsData
    Class contains the topics.
